ygData.subject: Re: Out for the fun of it.
ygData.msgSnippet: Wolfblade:: She felt his love returned to her and it made her spark pulse even faster.  How she would gladly let her spark return to the Matrix for a moment

Wolfblade::

She felt his love returned to her and it made her spark pulse even
faster.  How she would gladly let her spark return to the Matrix for a
moment longer of his love for her. She let her arms tighten around him
as she never wanted to let go. She knew she loved him and would die
for him at a moment's notice. Then a small program cycled in the back
of her mind.  She loved him wnough to not make him choose. She knew he
was her spark-mate. But her love for him went beyond herself. More
than her own happiness, she wanted him to be happy.  She knew she
could make him feel on top of the universe.  But to ask him to tear
his spark into pieces just to make a choice was more torture than her
spark could bare.  She shoved this thought process into the back of
her mind and just savored what she thought was her last bit of
happiness with him.  She felt her face plates flush a bit as a soft
moan escaped from her.  She couldn't help it. She loved him and wanted
him so much. So badly she needed him. A war had started in her, not a
war for life or territory, not for factions or bases. But the hardest
war of all, to make a choise for love. She wished that once this
moment had passes her spark would stop for she didn't want to live
past this moment. 
She sighed and melted into his arms even further. Without realizing
it, a soft whisper escaped her lips, "I Love You." and kissed him even
harder. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> He felt the old twisting anger rise up in him once again.  He had
been doing so well keeping it supressed the last few days, since
meeting Wolfblade then Blacknightmare.  But it felt like the burning
rage was returning, and didn't know when he'd be able to calm down. 
But thankfully it suddenly melted away when she suprised him with a
passionate kiss.  At first total suprise kept him from doing anything,
but he melted into the kiss and reciprocated, letting his love for her
flow through him to her.  he held her closer, not willing to part with
her for anything else in the world.  He'd have his spark ripped out of
his chest before then.  He made a realization, one that would change
their lives forever, but did not break the moment of passion, feeling
the need to continue it until he no longer could.
>
